p: Chickens immunized with a low dose (200 μL) of bioadhesive liposomal influenza vaccine using liposomes prepared with tremella or xanthan gum as the bioadhesive polysaccharide showed considerably higher mucosal and serum antibody levels, and low-viscosity gel mixed with liposomes was found to be suitable for nasal delivery and chickens elicited higher mucosal secretory IgA and serum IgG after two vaccinations compared to application of liposome mixture with a high-viscosity gel (Chiou et al. 2009).
